description: Helga Wauters is accused of causing the death of Xynthia Hawke while performing a Caesarian section.
title: Belgian anaesthetist accused of causing Brit's death while drunk
title_page: Belgian anaesthetist accused of causing Brit's death while drunk - BBC News
maintext: "They are going to hear things that they didn't know, or preferred not to know, about what emerged during the investigation," a lawyer for the family said on Wednesday.
